item.title: Moderna Inc 10-K
item.description: Moderna Inc, which is in the Biological Products (No Diagnostic Substances) [2836] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 24, 2023 had 62363 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: mrna - 679 instances may - 672 instances development - 441 instances clinical - 373 instances 2022 - 333 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
